artist: Artist: Kobayashi Kiyochika; Publisher: Fukuda Hatsujirō
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: horizontal chūban; accordion style book; cream-colored front and back cover with circular designs in floral-like shapes, surrounded by dotted patterns in green, yellow, maroon and lavender pigments; cover has a faint, linear woodgrain pattern; front cover has vertical band with alternating brown speckled bands of pigment, and Japanese characters in center; interior pages depict brightly colored, whimsical images with animated figures
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Pastime Society (Dōraku kyōkai 道楽協会)
text: Set of 12 chūban prints from the series Pastime Society (Dōraku kyōkai 道楽協会) bound in an album.
title: Album of 12 prints from the series "Pastime Society"
